pkgmetadata.longdescription: Network Filtering Methods and Measures // Implements numerous network filtering methods (TMFG; Massara, Di Matteo, Aste (2016) doi:10.1093/comnet/cnw015, MaST; Chu Liu (1965) and Edmonds (1967) doi:10.6028/jres.071B.032, ECO; Fallani, Latora, Chavez (2017) doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1005305, and ECO+MaST; Fallani, Latora, Chavez (2017) doi:10.1371/journal.pcbi.1005305), and several network measures (centrality, characteristic path length, clustering coefficient, and edge replication; Rubinov and Sporns (2010) doi:10.1016/j.neuroimage.2009.10.003).
